H0.text: Norm of reaction is the phenotypic range of a particular genotype.

H1.text: Diversity is the phenotypic range of a particular genotype.

H2.text: Natural selection is the phenotypic range of a particular genotype.

H3.text: Range of motion is the phenotypic range of a particular genotype.

A4.text: a reaction norm describes the pattern of phenotypic expression of a single genotype across a range of environments.
